title: Implement theme system with CSS variables
description: Create CSS custom properties for colors, backgrounds, borders, and other theme-aware styles. Set up light and dark theme variable sets.

title: Update existing UI components for theme support
description: Audit and update all existing components to use CSS variables instead of hardcoded colors. Ensure consistent appearance in both themes.

title: Add system preference detection (prefers-color-scheme)
description: Detect user's OS-level dark mode preference using prefers-color-scheme media query. Use as default when no saved preference exists.

title: Create React theme context/provider
description: Implement ThemeContext and ThemeProvider to manage theme state across the application. Expose theme value and toggle function.
close_reason: Implemented ThemeContext and ThemeProvider with useTheme hook in /lib/contexts/ThemeContext.tsx, created Providers wrapper component, and integrated into app/layout.tsx

title: Accessibility testing for dark mode
description: Verify color contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards in both themes. Test with screen readers and keyboard navigation.

title: Write E2E tests for theme switching
description: Create end-to-end tests verifying theme toggle works across page navigation, persists after refresh, and respects system preferences.

title: Write unit tests for toggle component
description: Test toggle component rendering, click handling, accessibility attributes, and visual state indication.

title: Build dark mode toggle component
description: Create a reusable toggle switch component for switching between light and dark modes. Should be accessible and visually indicate current state.

title: Visual regression testing for both themes
description: Set up visual regression tests to capture screenshots in both light and dark modes. Detect unintended visual changes.

title: Add smooth CSS transitions between themes
description: Implement CSS transitions for theme changes to avoid jarring visual switches. Consider performance impact and respect reduced-motion preferences.

title: Implement theme persistence in localStorage
description: Save user's theme preference to localStorage and restore it on app load. Handle cases where localStorage is unavailable.

description: Test ThemeProvider, theme toggle function, localStorage persistence, and system preference detection logic.
